sentences.en: a boxer with a good left jab
sentences.cn: 能打出漂亮左刺拳的拳击手

sentences.en: A thrust or jab does le damage but increases your attack range.
sentences.cn: 前刺或前戳,杀伤力小,但攻击范围大.

sentences.en: Be careful ! Don't jab my eye out with your umbrella!
sentences.cn: 当心 你的伞不要把我的眼睛戳出来.

sentences.en: Be careful! Don't jab his eye out with your bamboo pole.
sentences.cn: 小心! 你的竹竿别捅了他的眼睛.

sentences.en: Don't jab me with the stick.
He fended off a jab at his chest.
He gave me a jab with his finger.
He got jab bed in the lower part of his chest.
He neatly fended off a jab at his chest.
sentences.cn: 他利落地挡开了当胸的一击.

sentences.en: He saw her jab her thumb on a red button – a panic button.
sentences.cn: 他看见她用拇指猛按了一个红色按钮–应急按钮。

sentences.en: He warned me with a jab with his finger.
sentences.cn: 他用指头戳了我一下表示提醒.

sentences.en: He was knocked out with a swift jab to the jaw.
sentences.cn: 他的下颚被迅速一击,致使他昏迷.

sentences.en: Jab him, if you can, with your left fist.
sentences.cn: 要是有可能, 用左拳给他一下子.

sentences.en: The Boxer took his opponent a sharp jab to the riBs.
sentences.cn: 这个拳击选手对准其对手的肋骨猛砸一拳.

sentences.en: Why are you always taking a jab at your friends?
sentences.cn: 你为何总是挖苦你的朋友?

trans.tran_en: a sudden hard hit, especially with a pointed object or your fist(= closed hand )
to push something into or towards something else with short quick movements
